content: knit with c2 round 2 knit with c1 round 1 knit to last 2 sts ssk 65 sts repeat rnds 1 and 2 eleven times more round 2 *k11 ssk repeat from * to end 60 sts round 3 *k10 ssk repeat from * to end 55 sts daffodil hat 2x2 stripes round 4 *k9 ssk repeat from * to end 50 sts rnds 1 and 2 knit with c2 round 5 *k8 ssk repeat from * to end 45 sts rnds 3 and 4 knit with c1 round 6 *k7 ssk repeat from * to end 40 sts repeat rnds 1-4 five times more round 7 *k6 ssk repeat from * to end 35 sts round 8 *k5 ssk repeat from * to end 30 sts juanita hat 2x3 stripes round 9 *k4 ssk repeat from * to end 25 sts rnds 1 and 2 knit with c1 round 10 *k3 ssk repeat from * to end 20 sts rnds 3-5 knit with c2 round 11 ssk 10 times 10 sts piece measures 9¼ from co repeat rnds 1-5 four times more cut yarn leaving a 12 tail thread tail through rem sts twice very vivid hat 1x3 stripes pull snugly to close hole at top of hat then fasten_off on ws round 1 knit with c1 rnds 2-4 knit with c2 finishing repeat rnds 1-4 five times more weave in ends steam-block if desired helium hat half and half make 3 pompom in c2 and attach rnds 1-12 knit with c1 cut c1 rnds 13-24 knit with c2 all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 11/29/23 © fairmount fibers ltd 2023 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 3 of 3
